title: P.F. Chang's CEO Says Dining Is Rebounding
itunes:title: P.F. Chang's CEO Says Dining Is Rebounding
description:
Damola Adamolekun, Chief Executive Officer at P.F. Chang's, discusses seeing a recovery for the restaurant industry and the company expanding its "To Go" concept.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
